title: Week 7 Road Tests & Undefeated Teams Conversations
description:
Christine Williamson, Desmond Howard and David Pollack tell us everything we need to know about the Top 10 matchups with weekend. Plus, Desmond and David tell us which undefeated teams they think aren't haven't had enough praise this season. Also, which road team will have the biggest challenge this week? And, stay tuned to find out who the crew thinks is leading the PAC 12.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew previews some of the biggest games for Week 7 and the undefeated teams that have flown under the radar
